text: læa chaw swrrkh di rxng reiyk chaw nrk wa thæcring phwk rea di phb læw wa sing thi phracea khxng rea di sayya kæ rea wi nan pen khwam cring læa phwk than di phb sing thi phracea khxng phwk than di thrng sayya wi pen khwam cring him phwk khea klaw wa pen khwam cring læw mi phu prakas khn hnung di prakas khun nı rahwang phwk khea wa khx laxˌnat khx ngxallxhˌ cng mi tæ phu xthrrm thanghlay theid
